attributes.action: Grant the award of the Victoria Cross to Colonel Blair Mayne
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 1945, Field marshall Montgomery recommended the award of the VC to Col Blair Mayne for actions around Oldenburg in Germany. The award progressed and even King George thought it had been awarded. It was suddenly downgraded to a DSO. We petition the PM to reinstate the award and name those responsible for downgrading that award

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
